# isHidden

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether the application is currently hidden.

## Declaration

```swift
var isHidden: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is observable using key-value observing.

## Hiding and unhiding applications

- **hide()**: Attempts to hide or the application.
- **unhide()**: Attempts to unhide or the application.

items.description: Attempts to hide or the application.
items.name: hide()

items.description: Attempts to unhide or the application.
